apihelp-query+aspaklaryalog-example-byac: Example usage of the API to list recent log entries of approved images.
apihelp-query+aspaklaryalog-example-byus: Example usage of the API to list log entries performed by a specific user.
apihelp-query+aspaklaryalog-example-simp: Example usage of the API to list recent entries in the Aspaklarya image review log.
aspaklarya-notification-approved:
Notification message displayed when an image has been approved by a reviewer.

Parameters:
* $1 - The filename of the approved image.
aspaklarya-notification-edited:
Notification message displayed when an image has been edited and needs rechecking.

Parameters:
* $1 - The filename of the edited image.
aspaklarya-notification-removed:
Notification message displayed when an image has been removed from articles.

Parameters:
* $1 - The filename of the removed image.
aspaklarya-queue-approve: Label for the button to approve an image in the review queue.
aspaklarya-queue-edited: Label for the button to mark an image as edited in the review queue.
aspaklarya-queue-empty: Message displayed when there are no images in the review queue.
aspaklarya-queue-error-processing: Error message displayed when there is an issue processing an image in the review queue.
aspaklarya-queue-file-blocked: Success message shown when a file page is blocked
aspaklarya-queue-image-removed: Success message shown when an image is removed from an article. $1 is the page title
aspaklarya-queue-nav-prev: Label for the button to navigate to the previous page in the image review queue.
aspaklarya-queue-nav-next: Label for the button to navigate to the next page in the image review queue.
aspaklarya-queue-nav-range:
Text showing the current range of items displayed in the image review queue (e.g., '1-25 of 100').

Parameters:
* $1 - Start of the range (e.g., 1)
* $2 - End of the range (e.g., 25)
* $3 - Total number of items (e.g., 100)
aspaklarya-queue-nav-per-page:
Label for the dropdown option to select the number of items to display per page in the image review queue.

Parameters:
* $1 - Number of items per page (e.g., 25)
aspaklarya-queue-nav-go: Label for the button that submits the form to apply the selected number of items per page in the image review queue.
aspaklarya-queue-notification-error: Error message shown when a notification fails to send to a user
aspaklarya-queue-notification-sent: Success message shown when a notification is sent to a user
aspaklarya-queue-page:
Text indicating the page where the image appears.

Parameters:
* $1 - The title of the page where the image is used.
aspaklarya-queue-previously-reviewed:
Notice shown in the queue when an image was previously reviewed.

Parameters:
* $1 - Status of the previous review (approved, removed, or edited)
* $2 - Timestamp of the previous review
* $3 - Username of the reviewer
aspaklarya-queue-remove: Label for the button to remove an image from the review queue and articles.
aspaklarya-queue-requested-by:
Text indicating the user who submitted the image for review.

Parameters:
* $1 - The username of the submitting user.
aspaklarya-queue-success: Success message displayed after a queue action (e.g., approve, remove, edited) is completed successfully.
aspaklarya-queue-timestamp:
Text indicating when the image was submitted for review.

Parameters:
* $1 - The timestamp of submission (in a human-readable format).
aspaklarya-queue-title: Title of the special page showing the image review queue.
aspaklarya-review-button: Label for the button or link to open the image review dialog.
aspaklarya-review-by-reviewer:
Text appended to the previously reviewed message indicating the reviewer of the image.

Parameters:
* $1 - Username of the reviewer.
aspaklarya-review-cancel: Label for the button to cancel the image review submission dialog.
aspaklarya-review-confirm-no: Button text to cancel re-review of an image.
aspaklarya-review-confirm-title: Title of the confirmation dialog for re-reviewing images.
aspaklarya-review-confirm-yes: Button text to confirm re-review of an image.
aspaklarya-review-error:
Error message displayed when submitting an image for review fails.

Parameters:
* $1 - The specific error message or filename causing the error.
aspaklarya-review-no-images: Message displayed when there are no images on the current page to submit for review.
aspaklarya-review-no-selection: Message displayed when no images are selected in the review dialog before submission.
aspaklarya-review-partial-error: Error message displayed when some images fail to be submitted for review.
aspaklarya-review-previously-reviewed:
Message shown when an image was previously reviewed.

Parameters:
* $1 - Filename of the image
* $2 - Status of the previous review (approved, removed, or edited)
* $3 - Timestamp of the previous review
aspaklarya-review-submit: Label for the button to submit selected images for review.
aspaklarya-review-submitting: Message displayed while images are being submitted for review.
aspaklarya-review-success: Success message displayed after an image is successfully submitted for review.
aspaklarya-review-title: Title of the dialog for submitting images for review.
aspaklarya-review-tooltip: Tooltip text for the button or link to submit images for review.
aspaklarya-status-approved: Status label for an approved image
aspaklarya-status-edited: Status label for an edited image
aspaklarya-status-pending: Status label for a pending image
aspaklarya-status-removed: Status label for a removed image
aspaklarya-status-unknown: Status label for an unknown image status
aspaklaryareview: Name of the extension, used as the API module name and general identifier.
aspaklaryareview-desc:
{{desc|name=AspaklaryaReview|url=https://github.com/n-michlol/AspaklaryaReview}}
Description of the extension for MediaWiki.
echo-category-title-aspaklarya-review: Category title for Echo notifications related to updates on reviewed images.
echo-pref-tooltip-aspaklarya-review: Tooltip for the Echo notification preference to enable notifications about reviewed images, whether they need to be rechecked in NetFree, and additional updates.
log-description-aspaklaryareview: Description of the Aspaklarya image review log, explaining its purpose in the logs interface.
log-name-aspaklaryareview: Name of the log for Aspaklarya image review actions, shown in the logs list.
logentry-aspaklaryareview-approved:
Log entry message displayed when a user approves an image.

Parameters:
* $1 - Link to the user
* $2 - Username (for gender handling)
* $4 - Link to the image.
logentry-aspaklaryareview-edited:
Log entry message displayed when a user marks an image as edited.

Parameters:
* $1 - Link to the user
* $2 - Username (for gender handling)
* $4 - Link to the image.
logentry-aspaklaryareview-removed:
Log entry message displayed when a user removes an image from review.

Parameters:
* $1 - Link to the user
* $2 - Username (for gender handling)
* $4 - Link to the image.
logentry-aspaklaryareview-submit:
Log entry message displayed when a user submits an image for review.

Parameters:
* $1 - Link to the user
* $2 - Username (for gender handling)
* $4 - Link to the image.
notification-link-text-view-file: Label for the link in notifications to view the file in question.
right-aspaklarya-review: Description of the user right required to review images in the queue.
right-aspaklarya-review-log: Description of the user right required to view the Aspaklarya image review log.
version-aspaklarya: The name of the Aspaklarya extension type as shown in Special:Version
version-aspaklarya-desc: Description of the Aspaklarya extension type in Special:Version
